thread.section_title: StorageMart Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of StorageMart | storage-mart.com | 3 of 215
thread.title: Michael Cavanaugh

author: Michael Cavanaugh
title: Michael Cavanaugh
text:
I am very impressed with the level of service I received from the time I asked the first question. I was taken to a garage for viewing, back to the office and signed papers for auto withdrawals. Whole process took 20 minutes at the most. Both site manager (Women) and Dave couldn't have been more pleasant.
Today I was in the garage and saw the manager driving around just checking on things. A smile and hello was all that was said and off she was checking the site.
